paragraphs.content: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to Timothy
paragraphs.contentHtml: <small>The First Epistle of</small> <small>Paul the Apostle to</small> Timothy

paragraphs.content: Chapter 1
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 1

paragraphs.content: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;

paragraphs.content: Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.

paragraphs.content: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,
paragraphs.contentHtml: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,

paragraphs.content: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.

paragraphs.content: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:

paragraphs.content: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;
paragraphs.contentHtml: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;

paragraphs.content: Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.

paragraphs.content: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;
paragraphs.contentHtml: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;

paragraphs.content: Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

paragraphs.content: For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;
paragraphs.contentHtml: For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;

paragraphs.content: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.
paragraphs.contentHtml: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

paragraphs.content: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;

paragraphs.content: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.

paragraphs.content: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

paragraphs.content: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.

paragraphs.content: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.

paragraphs.content: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

paragraphs.content: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;
paragraphs.contentHtml: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;

paragraphs.content: Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:

paragraphs.content: Of whom is Hymenæus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Of whom is Hymenæus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
